scripts.deployDev: cpx config/dev/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://special.spbarchives.ru' react-scripts build && vk-miniapps-deploy
scripts.deployProd: cpx config/prod/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://medal.spbarchives.ru' react-scripts build && vk-miniapps-deploy
scripts.startYakovlev: cpx config/yakovlev/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://special.spbarchives.ru' PORT=10888 HTTPS=true react-scripts start
scripts.deployYakovlev: cpx config/yakovlev/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://special.spbarchives.ru' react-scripts build && vk-miniapps-deploy
scripts.startAleksandrov: cpx config/aleksandrov/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://special.spbarchives.ru' PORT=10888 HTTPS=true react-scripts start
scripts.deployAleksandrov: cpx config/aleksandrov/vk-hosting-config.json . && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL='https://special.spbarchives.ru' react-scripts build && vk-miniapps-deploy
